content: For the third quarter of fiscal 2022, we reported net income attributable to come stockholders of $2.2 million or $0.04 per basic and diluted share as compared to net income attributable to common stockholders of $800,000 or $0.01 per basic and diluted share for the third quarter of fiscal 2021. For the first nine months of fiscal 2022, the company recorded net income attributable to common stockholders of $12.1 million or $0.20 per basic and $0.19 per diluted share compared to net income attributable to common stockholders of $5.6 million or $0.10 per basic and diluted share for the fiscal 2021 period.
